name: Halloween Cookie Pizza
author: Lorena Essner

ingredients.name: c. Hershey's semi sweet chocolate chips

instructions: Heat oven to 350°. Lightly grease 12 inch round pizza pan. In large mixer bowl, beat sugar and shortening until creamy. Add egg, water, and vanilla; beat well. In separate bowl stir together flour, baking soda and salt. Add to sugar mixture, beating on low speed until well blended. Stir in peanut butter chips. Spread batter in prepared pan to within 1/2 inch of edge. Bake 11 to 13 minutes or until set. Remove from oven. Sprinkle marshmallows, chocolate chips and pecans over top. Bake another 5 to 7 minutes until marshmallows are lightly browned. Can drizzle on top, chocolate and or orange drizzle. Chocolate drizzle: 1/4 cup chocolate chips and 1⁄2 teaspoon Crisco butter flavored, melted. Orange drizzle: 1⁄2 cup powdered sugar and 1 tablespoon water and orange coloring.
